tweet: *runs in the forest in my human form towards Forks*
*gets to the end of the forest and walks out of the forest and looks both ways before going to the other side of the street*
*looks around making sure no ones watching and bumps into a man grabbing his wallet*
*quickly takes the mans wallet and runs the opposite direction hearing his yells as i run*
*turns and runs down one of the streets and looks around noticing i lost him and opens the wallet*
